channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Survey Reveals Dealers Are Boosting AI Use To Boost Revenue
item.description: A new survey of auto dealership executives by Fullpath sheds light on new enthusiasm for the technology and how it's used to boost revenue.

item.title: 1 Million Websites Vulnerable To Dangerous Sitting Duck Cyber Attacks
item.description: At least a million websites are at risk from sitting duck attacks used by multiple hackers in ongoing cyber attacks. Here’s what you need to know.

item.title: Can Your Organization Withstand A Regulations Compliance Catastrophe?
item.description: To be compliant, companies need to understand, manage and protect their data.
